statements: SELECT task_id, task_name, task_description FROM maintenance_tasks;
SELECT * FROM maintenance_tasks WHERE frequency_interval > 10;
SELECT task_name, next_due_date FROM maintenance_tasks ORDER BY next_due_date DESC;
SELECT task_id, task_name, task_description FROM maintenance_tasks WHERE last_completed_date IS NULL;
SELECT task_name, frequency_interval FROM maintenance_tasks WHERE task_id = 3;
SELECT * FROM maintenance_tasks WHERE frequency_interval > 10
SELECT task_id, task_name, last_completed_date FROM maintenance_tasks WHERE task_id IN (1, 3, 5)
SELECT task_name, task_description FROM maintenance_tasks WHERE last_completed_date < '2021-01-01'
SELECT * FROM maintenance_tasks WHERE task_name LIKE 'Oil%'
SELECT task_id, task_name, next_due_date FROM maintenance_tasks WHERE next_due_date BETWEEN '2021-08-01' AND '2021-08-31'
SELECT * FROM maintenance_schedule WHERE building_id = 1;
SELECT task_name, frequency FROM maintenance_schedule WHERE id = 5;
SELECT * FROM maintenance_schedule WHERE start_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT task_name, task_description FROM maintenance_tasks WHERE task_id = 3;
SELECT * FROM maintenance_schedule ORDER BY start_date DESC, frequency ASC;
SELECT * FROM maintenance_schedule WHERE building_id = 1 ORDER BY start_date DESC;
SELECT task_name, frequency FROM maintenance_schedule WHERE start_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT building_id, COUNT(*) AS task_count FROM maintenance_schedule GROUP BY building_id HAVING COUNT(*) > 2;
SELECT task_name, task_description FROM maintenance_tasks WHERE task_id = 1;
SELECT building_id, MAX(frequency) AS max_frequency FROM maintenance_schedule GROUP BY building_id ORDER BY max_frequency DESC;
SELECT * FROM maintenance_schedule
SELECT building_id, task_name, scheduled_date FROM maintenance_schedule
SELECT task_name, building_id, scheduled_date FROM maintenance_schedule ORDER BY scheduled_date DESC
SELECT * FROM maintenance_schedule WHERE task_name = 'Repair'
SELECT building_id, task_name FROM maintenance_schedule WHERE scheduled_date > '2022-09-01'
SELECT * FROM maintenance_schedule WHERE task_name = 'Maintenance Task 1';
SELECT * FROM maintenance_schedule WHERE scheduled_date >= '2021-08-01';
SELECT id, task_name, scheduled_date FROM maintenance_schedule WHERE building_id = '12345678-90ab-cdef-1234-567890abcdef';
SELECT * FROM maintenance_schedule WHERE task_name LIKE '%Maintenance%';
SELECT building_id, count(*) AS tasks_count FROM maintenance_schedule GROUP BY building_id ORDER BY tasks_count DESC;
SELECT * FROM Building;
SELECT building_name, location FROM Building WHERE construction_date > '2020-01-01';
SELECT schedule_id, task_description FROM MaintenanceSchedule ORDER BY schedule_date DESC;
SELECT task_name, task_duration, task_cost FROM MaintenanceTasks WHERE task_cost > 1000;
SELECT assignment_id, assignment_status FROM TaskAssignments WHERE assignment_date BETWEEN '2020-01-01' AND '2021-01-01';
SELECT * FROM Building WHERE location='New York';
SELECT building_name, construction_date FROM Building ORDER BY construction_date DESC;
SELECT task_name, task_duration FROM MaintenanceTasks WHERE task_cost > 1000;

SELECT ts.assignment_id, ms.schedule_date, mt.task_name FROM TaskAssignments ts JOIN MaintenanceSchedule ms ON ts.schedule_id = ms.schedule_id JOIN MaintenanceTasks mt ON ts.task_id = mt.task_id WHERE ts.assignment_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-02-28';

SELECT b.building_name, COUNT(ta.task_id) AS num_tasks FROM Building b LEFT JOIN MaintenanceSchedule ms ON b.building_id = ms.building_id LEFT JOIN TaskAssignments ta ON ms.schedule_id = ta.schedule_id GROUP BY b.building_name HAVING num_tasks > 3;
SELECT * FROM maintenance_schedule;
SELECT building_id, task_name, schedule_date FROM maintenance_schedule;
SELECT task_name, task_description FROM maintenance_tasks;
SELECT building_name, maintenance_cost FROM building_infrastructure;
SELECT assignment_id, assigned_to, assigned_date FROM maintenance_assignments;
SELECT * FROM maintenance_schedule ORDER BY schedule_date ASC, building_id DESC LIMIT 10;

SELECT building_name, task_name, task_description FROM building_infrastructure JOIN maintenance_schedule ON building_infrastructure.building_id = maintenance_schedule.building_id WHERE maintenance_schedule.schedule_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT task_name, estimated_time_hours FROM maintenance_tasks WHERE estimated_time_hours > 5 ORDER BY task_name ASC;
SELECT MAX(estimated_time_hours) AS max_estimated_time FROM maintenance_tasks;

SELECT task_name, SUM(maintenance_cost) AS total_cost FROM maintenance_tasks JOIN building_infrastructure ON maintenance_tasks.task_id = building_infrastructure.building_id GROUP BY task_name HAVING total_cost > 1000;
